name: Tomato Soup
description: A perfect comforting soup for wintery days when served with some croutons, garlic bread, grilled cheese or chilli cheese toast.

name: Spinach Soup
description: This spinach soup is healthy, absolutely delicious and has been a family favorite for years. The texture is smooth and the addition of ghee sauteed garlic on top makes it so rich and flavorful.

name: Sweet Corn Soup
description: This sweet corn soup is perfect starter dish for your indo-chinese meal.

name: Vegetable Soup
description: This vegetable soup is perfect for wintery, cold days.

name: Zuchhini Chips
description: These healthy, vegan air fryer zucchini chips are so crispy and tasty. If you’re looking for a healthy snack then these non-greasy chips are perfect and give you a serving of veggies too.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Paneer cubes, onions and peppers are marinated in a creamy yogurt marinade that’s rich in spices and grilled into the oven to lend that perfect crave-able smokey flavor.

name: Hara Bhara Kabab
description: Veg Hara Bhara Kabab is a flavorful and vibrant Indian vegetarian kebab made with a mix of spinach, peas, potatoes, and spices, offering a delightful green hue.

name: Paneer Chilli
description: This Hyderabadi paneer chilli starter is deliciously bright, flavorful, spicy and super tasty.

name: Veg. Spring Rolls
description: This Veg Spring Rolls are crisp, golden-brown rolls filled with a delightful medley of stir-fried vegetables, offering a perfect balance of crunch and flavor in every bite.

name: Masala Papad
description: This masala papad is crispy papad topped with spiced onion-tomato mixture along with coriander.

name: French Fries
description: This French fries are golden and crispy potato strips, seasoned to perfection, and enjoyed as a classic and irresistible side dish or snack.

name: Burger
description: This burger is mouthwatering delight, featuring a fried patty, nestled between soft buns, and adorned with a variety of flavorful toppings.

name: Veg. Pizza
description: This Veg Pizza is a delectable creation topped with a colorful assortment of fresh vegetables, cheese, and tomato sauce on a crispy crust, offering a burst of flavors in every slice.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Margherita Pizza is a classic Italian masterpiece, with a thin crust, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and a drizzle of olive oil, delivering an authentic taste experience.

name: Mac and Cheese
description: This mac and cheese is healthy and made with protein-packed cottage cheese and is both creamy and satisfying.

name: Penne Pomodoro
description: This penne pasta is practically guaranteed to become your family favorite. This pomodoro sauce is a staple in Italian cooking and is known for its robust tomato taste.

name: Paneer Bhurji
description: Grated paneer or scrambled paneer sauteed with onion, tomato, bell pepper, and a few spices.

name: Matar Paneer
description: Matar Paneer is incredibly flavorful thanks to the vibrant, spicy onion-tomato gravy. And who can resist that soft, succulent paneer cubes with perfectly cooked, soft green peas.

name: Whole Masoor Dal
description: This masoor dal is a must-try Indian lentil curry. It is a healthy, flavorful, protein-packed vegetarian dinner (+vegan).

name: Spinach Rice
description: This Spinach rice is a flavorful dish where aromatic basmati rice is infused with the vibrant essence of spinach, creating a nutritious and delicious green-hued rice delicacy.

name: Corn Pulao
description: This sweet corn pulao has a mild yet delicious flavors. Here some green peas along with sweet corn kernels are added for some pop of color.

name: Palak Paneer
description: This palak paneer is a dish containing Indian cottage cheese over a vibrant green spiced spinach sauce and finished with a splash of cashew cream.

name: Rogan Josh
description: This rogan josh contains succulent pieces of Goat or Lamb braised in gravy flavored with aromatic spices like fennel, cloves, cardamom, cinnamon & ginger.

name: Grilled Chicken
description: This dish is juicy grilled chicken breasts, topped with a delicious ruby-red cherry salsa, made from the season’s best local cherries.

name: Chicken Masala
description: This is a basic Indian aromatic curry paste with chicken dish that pairs perfectly with Naan or rice.

name: Falafel Pita
description: This dish is Falafel in a soft pita lined with hummus, over some tangy Turkish Salad and drizzled with lemony Tahini Sauce

name: Chicken Fiesta Rice
description: This chicken fiesta rice is a vibrant and flavorful dish featuring tender chicken, colorful bell peppers, and aromatic rice.

name: Beef Goulash
description: This beef goulash is essentially a hearty beef stew, seasoned with paprika and other spices.

name: Mexican Rice
description: This Mexican rice is an aromatic dish infused with tomatoes, onions, and spices, offering a flavorful culinary experience.

name: Tuna Lasagna Rolls
description: This dish has all the comforting flavors of a cheesy tuna noodle casserole, but with the sophisticated appearance of a lasagna roll.

name: Coconut Shrimp Curry
description: This dish is simply flavored with garlic, ginger and chili peppers alongside with shrimp and rice.

name: Butter Naan
description: Butter Naan is a soft and pillowy Indian bread, brushed with butter, creating a delightful accompaniment to savor with your favorite curries.

name: Butter Kulcha
description: Butter Kulcha is a delectable Indian bread, soft and fluffy, offering a rich complement to elevate your dining experience.

name: Paratha
description: Paratha is a versatile Indian flatbread, cooked to golden perfection, a delightful accompaniment to a range of savory and sweet dishes.

name: Coconut Mojito
description: It is the perfect drink to kick of the summer with its refreshing mint, tangy lime and creamy sweet coco-nutty goodness.

name: Cranberry Cocktail
description: This sweet and fruity cranberry cocktail is perfect for any special occasion. Taste it and it will be Love at first sip!

name: White Wine sangria
description: This drink is prepared using a slightly sweet White Wine, Canada Dry Ginger Ale and Sparkling Apple Cider.

name: Strawberry Cream Frappe
description: Sip on the sweetness of summer with our Strawberry Cream Frappe, a luscious blend of strawberries and creamy goodness.

name: Iced Coffee Frappe
description: Cool down your day with our Iced Coffee Frappe, a refreshing pick-me-up for coffee enthusiasts.

name: Peached Iced Tea
description: Experience the perfect balance of sweetness and zest with our Peached Iced Tea, a delightful peach-infused refreshment.

name: Watermelon Iced Tea
description: Quench your thirst with a burst of flavor in our Watermelon Iced Tea, a fruity and invigorating choice.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: Tropical paradise meets your glass in our Mango Smoothie, a velvety blend of ripe mangoes for a refreshing treat.

name: Banana Smoothie
description: Embrace the smooth and creamy essence of our Banana Smoothie, a delightful fusion of bananas and indulgence.

name: Dragon Fruit Iced Tea
description: Elevate your tea experience with a burst of exotic flavor in our Dragon Fruit Iced Tea, a vibrant and refreshing delight.

name: Mixed Berries Frappe
description: Savor the medley of berries in our Mixed Berries Frappe, a cool and fruity concoction for a delightful break.

name: Pineapple Smoothie
description: Transport yourself to the tropics with our Pineapple Smoothie, a tropical escape in every smooth sip.

name: Coca Cola
description: Classic and timeless, enjoy the crisp and effervescent taste of Coca Cola.

name: Sprite
description: Experience the light and refreshing citrus fizz of Sprite, a perfect companion for any occasion.

name: Mongo Juice
description: Quench your thirst with the pure essence of mango in our Mango Juice, a tropical delight in every sip.

name: Espresso
description: Awaken your senses with the bold kick of our Espresso, crafted for coffee aficionados seeking robust flavor.

name: Cappuccino
description: Indulge in the perfect balance of rich espresso and frothy milk with our classic Cappuccino.

name: Mocha
description: Satisfy your chocolate cravings with our Mocha, a velvety blend of espresso and decadent chocolate for the ultimate indulgence.

name: Strawberry French Cake
description: Crusty on the outside with a creamy crumb in the center, this cake is packed with fresh strawberries and is guaranteed to become your favorite!

name: Raspberry Heart
description: A gorgeous, decadent and delicious layered dessert, perfect for a loved one on date.

name: Santa Hat Brownie
description: Savor the festive joy with our Santa Hat Brownie, a delightful treat that brings a touch of holiday magic to every bite. (2 pcs)

name: Banana Bread
description: This is a super moist and delicious Banana Bread with Honey, Oats & Walnuts which easily melts in your mouth.

name: Vanilla Cardamom
description: A creamy frozen treat similar to ice-cream paired with fresh citrus in a syrup flavored with a hint of ginger & a splash of rose water.

name: BlueBerry Muffins
description: Enjoy a burst of freshness in every bite with our delectable blueberry muffins, a perfect blend of moist goodness and juicy blueberries.

name: Strawberry Crunch Cake
description: It is infused with strawberry flavor, topped with fluffy cream cheese frosting and then finished off with a strawberry-and-cookie topping.

name: Creamsicles
description: Satisfy your sweet tooth with a nostalgic twist, our Creamsicles offer a refreshing combination of creamy vanilla and zesty orange.

name: Key Lime Pie Mousse
description: This key lime pie has all of the refreshing tartness and buttery crumble of the classic dessert, but in an adorable, individual container.

name: Cookie Cream Icecream
description: This icecream is folded in Oreos, caramel sauce, and a touch of instant coffee for a caffeinated kick

name: Blueberry cheesecake Bars
description: Indulge in the heavenly harmony of our Blueberry Cheesecake Bars, where velvety cheesecake meets the sweet burst of blueberries.

name: Espresso Cookies
description: These are flavorful and has a stronge coffee taste in its soft and fudgy cookies,

name: Oatmeal Cookies
description: These no-bake chocolate peanut butter cookies are nostalgia at its finest.

name: Sponge Cake
description: This sponge cake is stacked with whipped cream and berries.

name: Coconut Cookies
description: This cocnot cookie is soft, chewy, slightly golden crispy edges with crispy toasted coconut strewn throughout.

name: Granita
description: Granita is perfect on its own as a light palate cleanser or dressed up with whipped cream and pineapple toppings
